mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl(cust_no, cust_name, phone, cust_email, grade) values(#{cust_no},#{cust_name},#{phone},#{cust_email},#{grade})
mapper.update: update member_tbl set cust_name=#{cust_name}, phone=#{phone}, cust_email=#{cust_email}, grade=#{grade} where cust_no=#{cust_no}
mapper.select: select mo.cust_no, me.cust_name, me.grade, sum(rent_price) as price from member_tbl me, rent_tbl mo where me.cust_no=mo.cust_no group by mo.cust_no,me.cust_name, me.grade order by price desc
